clean-plugin: cd .. && docker-compose run --rm wpcli plugin delete akismet hello
generate-data: cd .. && docker-compose run --user=www-data --rm wpcli bash -c "php -d memory_limit=512M /usr/local/bin/wp package install trendwerk/faker && php -d memory_limit=512M /usr/local/bin/wp faker fake wp-content/themes/wp-starter-theme/fakeData.yml "
